method: Heat the oven to 190C/375F/Gas 5. Line a 20x30cm/8x12in baking tin with baking parchment. Gently melt the butter and the sugar together in a large pan. Take off the heat and beat in the rest of the ingredients. Turn into the baking tin and bake for 30-40 minutes until the top of the brownie is firm but the inside still feels soft. Take out of the oven and cool in the tin. Cut into 5cm/2in squares when cool. Perfect with a cup of tea.
ingredients: 140g/5oz dark chocolate,  225g/8oz butter,  5 free-range eggs,  450g/1lb caster sugar,  110g/4oz plain flour,  55g/2oz cocoa powder
